title: Our Selection, Crafted Especially for You!

elena_fillet_mix.title: Elena Fillet Mix
elena_fillet_mix.description: An aroma and taste that unfolds with every bite – a flavor for true connoisseurs. A pinch of black pepper to tease the senses. Tender fillet that melts in your mouth. Dried for at least 15 days.
elena_fillet_mix.ingredients: Pork loin, sweet red pepper, black pepper, savory, and fenugreek

elena_fillet_clasic.title: Elena Fillet
elena_fillet_clasic.description: A classic to the table. Fresh Bulgarian meat – pure loin, delicately seasoned only with savory, fenugreek, and time. A taste up to standard. Dried for at least 15 days.

pastarma.title: Pastarma (Cured Pork)
pastarma.description: True Bulgarian pride – aromatic pastarma with a rich red pepper flavor, cured with craftsmanship and respect for tradition. A pleasure in every bite. Dried for at least 15 days.
pastarma.ingredients: Pork loin and sweet red pepper

pastarma_smoked.title: Pastarma Smoked
pastarma_smoked.description: Rich, smoky aroma and deep flavor that brings out the essence of tradition. Gently seasoned with smoked red pepper for a perfectly balanced taste. Dried for at least 15 days.
pastarma_smoked.ingredients: Pork loin with sweet and smoked red pepper
